message: Let's start with a fair split.  I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can adjust later if you're not happy.
I think a more even split is fairer.  Let's aim for 55/45, and we can see how the rest of the game goes from there.
I think we can find a middle ground.  I'm willing to lower my share to 60%, but I still think I should get the larger portion.
